Title: Object: Papyrus Anastasi 2
Description: Papyrus: Hieratic literary text recto and verso. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Recto: 6.1-6.4 "A letter of adulation to Pharaoah" 6.5-6.7 "Praise of Amun-Ra 6.7-8.5 "The profession of a Scribe is superior" 8.5-8.7 "Prayer of a defendant to Amun" 8.5-8.7 "Prayer of a defendant to Amun" Verso: Jottings and Love Songs
Curator's comments: Published in Gardiner Late Egyptian Miscellanies, Caminos Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Spalinger 'Encomia and Papyrus Anastasi II' in Quirke (ed.), Discovering Egypt from the Neva (Fs. Berlev), 123-44. Theodorides, RdE 21, p. 97 [8/7-9/1] (grammatical details)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380656) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380656)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: loss, fractured, insect attack Black ink Red ink Backed: white paper Checked for loan to Paris 2005 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather (deteriorated) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: fair
